content.question: <math alttext="the derivative, with respect to x, of, open parenthesis, x to the fifth power, minus 5 to the x power, close parenthesis, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="2.4ex" width="0.0em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction x to the sixth power over 6, end fraction, minus the fraction 5 to the x power, over the natural log of 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></math>

<math alttext="5 times x to the fourth power, minus 5 to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="5 times x to the fourth power, minus x, times 5 to the x minus 1 power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo largeop="true">⋅</mo></mrow></mstyle><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="5 times x to the fourth power, minus the natural log of 5, times 5 to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="5 times x to the fourth power, minus the natural log of 5, times 5 to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
